summary: Build a free, no-code, all-in-one live streaming platform called RockHog TV featuring multiple content categories (music, gaming, sports, horror, adult) and a purchasable viewer currency called Bacon Cash.
architectural_notes: Public share URL is rockhogtv.caffeine.xyz (use as canonical link for share/copy actions).

existing_features.title: Create the RockHog TV app shell with navigation for the five content categories: Music, Gaming, Sports, Horror, and Adult.

Implement a no-code creator/admin workflow in the UI to add and manage channels/streams, including: title, category (Music/Gaming/Sports/Horror/Adult), description, thumbnail image upload, and a stream source URL/embed code field.
Build viewer-facing browsing and watch pages: category listings (cards with thumbnail/title) and a stream detail page that renders the provided stream source (URL/embed) plus channel metadata.
Add Adult content gating: require an explicit age/consent confirmation before viewing Adult category listings and Adult stream pages, and show a content warning on entry.
Implement "Bacon Cash" as an in-app virtual currency balance per viewer account, including balance display in the UI and backend persistence.

Add a "Buy Bacon Cash" flow that lets viewers request a top-up amount and records a purchase request in the backend for fulfillment (since no payment rails were specified). Include an admin-only screen to mark requests as completed and credit the userâ€™s balance.
Add authentication via Internet Identity and basic roles/permissions: viewer (default), creator (can manage own channels), admin (can fulfill Bacon Cash requests and moderate/delete any channel).
Define and apply a coherent visual theme for RockHog TV (distinct, consistent colors/typography/layout) suitable for an entertainment streaming hub, avoiding a blue/purple default.
Generate and include static branding/category artwork (logo + category icons + a hero/banner) and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (not via backend).
Add a user-visible sharing control that lets users share RockHog TV by copying a link to the clipboard (and using the native share sheet when supported).
Add a new viewer-accessible "Contact" page that displays the site owner contact information (email address: brianlellis24@gmail.com) without any contact form or email-sending capability.
Add an in-app navigation entry point to the new Contact page from the global layout (footer is acceptable) so users can find it from anywhere in the app.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an all-in-one live streaming platform (no-code)
Support content categories/channels: music, gaming, sports, horror, and adult content
Add purchasable viewer virtual currency called "Bacon Cash"
Add a shareable RockHog TV link (e.g., copy/share button) so users can easily share the site/app
Add a non-email 'Contact / Site Owner' page that displays the owner's contact info (e.g., brianlellis24@gmail.com) without a contact form or email sending
